features: [1500W & Easy Cooking]--CUSIMAX Hot Plate used 7 thermostatically controlled heat settings conveniently to cook a variety of foods such as decoct steak, grilled cheese, boil water, make soup, cook pasta, warm sauces and do so much more. Meet your daily cooking needs.

[Safety & Durable]--Silver stainless steel body built to withstand frequent use. Durable cast iron cooktop. Simply wipe with a clean and damp cloth when cool. Automatic safety shutoff function with temperature regulated by a thermostat.

[All Types of Cookware]--CUSIMAX Electric burner is works with All Types of cookware. Compatible with pots and pans with maximum size of 7.1 inches. Works with glass and aluminum and heats cookware efficiently with minimal heat loss. Compared with the induction cooker, there is no noise and no electromagnetic radiation.

[Convenient & Portable]--Great for every day use or as an extra cooking appliance in a busy kitchen. The small scale in size makes it very portable. Ideal for parties, offices, courtyard, RV camping, or even to your journey. No stovetop required.

[Customer Service]--CUSIMAX offer a outstanding 30-day hassle-free return policy and free Lifetime Customer Service. All CUSIMAX products have passed ETL certification and comply with safety standards. Please refer to the instruction manual before use. Please contact us with any issues so that we can resolve them or replace your product.(Note: It is normal the body will get hot because the burner heats the pot through heat transfer.The heating light may cycle on and off during operation.)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Your Kitchen Assistant! Easy Cooking Electric Cooking Plate Powered by 120V and 1500-Watts, heats quickly and evenly with minimal heat loss and saving energy. This Hot Plate is powerful enough to use as an additional solid burner to warm sauces, make soups, boil water, cook pasta and veggies and do so much more, just as if it were a normal stove. When the single burner stops working, it can still use the remaining temperature to keep the food warm, so that you can taste the hot food in winter. The Portable Burner is equipped with 7 thermostatically controlled heat settings for precise cooking. Simply turn the control knob to the desired position, it will maintain the steady temperature for your cuisine until the setting is changed. Silver Stainless steel body built to withstand frequent use. Simply wipe with a clean cloth when cool. Smooth Stainless steel body not only built to withstand frequent use and good- looking. It is extremely suitable for the moment that when you need an extra burner or microwave, or as a substitute kitchen stove to entertain a large group.

The Hot Plate provides cooking flexibility to your kitchen. All of these troubles are a piece of cake for our CUSIMAX Hot Plates. It also comes in handy when you have a small working area. Very portable design. The compact size is easy to store and saves space. Ideal for apartments, offices, camping, or even your RV. And even you can take it on your travels. No stovetop required!!

USE MATTERS: When used for the first time, a small amount of smoke may appear in the product. This is due to the depletion of the protective coating on the heating element. After 1-2 normal uses, the smoke will automatically dissipate (usually within 30 minutes). This is normal and no need to worry.The burner transfers heat to the pot by heating itself, so do not directly touch the stove surface during use (Note: Heat will also be transferred to the knob, causing the knob to become hot).After the burner stops working, it takes about 20 minutes to cool down, which can better keep the food warm.To make the burner work quickly: 1. Preheat before use; 2. Use a pan to cook as much as possible; 3. Use a lid when cooking.Since the hot plate emits heat when in use, please place it on a high temperature resistant surface!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well. NO smell nor smoking!
reviews.reviewText: I'm quite pleased with this. Contrary to what many have said, there was absolutely NO SMOKING NOR SMELL when I first turned it on. None. It cooks nearly as well as my cooktop. The cast iron burner hold heat so incredibly well that a pot of water kept a rolling boil for probably another 5 minutes. Wish I'd timed it. I thought I'd forgotten to turn it off and kept checking it! Wipes clean SO easily, even after using it to fry hamburgers. Yes, I would definitely recommend this little worker bee!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It boils water!
reviews.reviewText: Ok. I have no stove in my basement apartment. I was using 1 of those cheap electric burners from the big blue box store (you know the one) and it could barely boil 3 cups of water. Not only that but it was impossible to clean.This 1 is soooo much better I can't beloeve it. When I boil my 3 cups of water I have to turn it _down_ because it boils so hard it splashes everywhere. I have boiled 3 quarts of water with no problem. I have not tried more than that. The knobs do get hot, but not so much that its usually a problem for me. I also set it on a cooling rack inside a cookie sheet so the fact that the whole thing is hot is a non issue for me.The user manual warns about the device smoking the 1st time you use it. IT DOES!!! It set off the smoke detector, and my upstairs roomate came downstairs to find out what the smoke smell was. There was smoke coming out of every single opening, even from behind the knobs. It did not all burn off with the 1st use either. It took several uses before I no longer noticed the smell. My advice, take it outside, plug it in, and let it go until the smoke is all gone before you use it inside.Now it's something I use daily and am so pleased with that it makes me smile every time I use it.Im thinking about buying another...Highly recomend!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great buy, sturdy and great for large pots
reviews.reviewText: I have a glass top electric stove which is a no use for my canning. Picked about 6 gallons grapes. Used my steam juicer on this electric plate. Had it one for about 5 hrs continuous use. Medium high temp. Did GREAT! Plate burner is big enough for my all American pressure canner too.Very happy so far with its slim design and ease of use. Sturdy very nice quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for in-room hotel cooking and heating!
reviews.reviewText: We recently stayed at a lodge on the extensive grounds of the beautiful Glen Eyrie Castle in the Garden of the Gods in Colorado. Although the lodge had a separate communal microwave and refrigerator, it was more convenient to use the CUSIMAX Electric Hot Plate in our room to heat our dinner, which worked very well, and can be used for other hotels that do not offer heating or cooking capabilities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: Happy with this purchase and item. so far I can cook anything including frying.. my only issue is the top near and around the hot plates gets really hot..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good backup unit, has downsides.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this hot plate on sale and because our oven was on the fritz. While we were waiting to get the oven fixed, we decided to get a hot plate to get some semblance of normal back in our home with cooking dinner vs. ordering out. I also can tomato sauce and pickles in the summer when the garden is in full swing, so I can always use another burner. The good: It heats up just fine and can be adjusted to a decent degree of accuracy, just takes some getting used to. A pot of hot water to boil 2lbs of pasta took about 8-9 minutes and then it took another 12-14 minutes to get to al dente. A bit longer than a regular burner, but as a backup, it worked great. The not so good: The labels on the unit seem to have been written in erasable ink because they’re all but wiped off, and we haven’t really cleaned the unit yet (have only had it for about 2 weeks). Also, the warning light only goes in when the unit is powered in, however the hot plate stays very hot for quite a while. Be careful not to touch, I already burned my fingers twice because I didn’t realize my wife used it to make tea. Finally, the unit gets hot, so if you think you can pick up the unit while it’s on or shortly after turning off, think again. The sides get just as hot as the burner. Otherwise, it gets things hot, so it works as we need it to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have had good experience owning one of these before.
reviews.reviewText: This is my second purchase and these little stoves are pretty strong and lasts a long time. I use it every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well but slow to heat up.
reviews.reviewText: Takes quite a few minutes to heat up. But heat is constant and controls are easy and accurate.

Bought this to use with a pressure canner as I have a glass stovetop. Wasn’t sure if it would work well enough to get the canner to the proper psi but it absolutely did and had no issues keeping it there.
Para una casa en Ixtapan de la Sal
I got delivery on Oct.15Return window closed Oct.10Product fused on first attemptNon working item

reviews.reviewTitle: Good hot plate got us through a stove change.
reviews.reviewText: Our 32 year old oven stopped working then short circuited due to frayed, crumbled insulation on some wires. We ordered a new stove but it was going to take three days to arrive so we ordered this hotplate which arrived the next day to be able to do some simple cooking until the new stove arrived. This lovely little hotplate looks elegant and heated food efficiently albeit less forcefully than the old coil stove top. Then we got the new stove so this hotplate will come in handy to use at the table to keep food warm when we have burritos or fondu.

The elements heat up evenly thanks to their cast iron covers.The elements take some time to get up to temperature, boiling 2 litres of water takes awhile.Good temperature control at lower setting for Eg. eggs.
